item.description:
From Member Lou Swinand:

NOTE: Thanks to all who responded - I now have a location set for the shoot!


I have a shoot scheduled for this Saturday, May 22 with an MUA/model and a second model. The theme is an evil clown/puppeteer and a Raggedy Ann puppet. The MUA will do all the makeup and they have made outfits.

We had a location but that is now not available.

I have portable lighting, etc. -- just need a large room.

group.name: Worcester Alliance of Photographers - AKA: WAP

item.name: Saturday, May 22- Photo shoot with models- Location Needed
